lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question. Why doesn't Aunt Jennifer tell anyone how
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题。为什么珍妮弗姨妈不告诉任何人她

lyrics.text: old she is? My Aunt Jennifer is an actress. She must be at least 35 years old. In spite of this,
lyrics.translation: 她多大年纪了？我的詹妮弗姨妈是一位演员。她至少得有35岁了。尽管如此，

lyrics.text: she often appears on the stage as a young girl. Jennifer will have to take part in a new play soon.
lyrics.translation: 她经常在舞台上扮演一个年轻女孩。珍妮弗很快将不得不参加一部新剧。

lyrics.text: This time she will be a girl 17. In the play she must appear in a bright red dress and long
lyrics.translation: 这一次她将扮演一个17岁的女孩。在剧中，她必须穿着鲜红色的裙子和长发出场。

lyrics.text: black stockings. Last year in another play she had to wear short socks and a bright orange colored
lyrics.translation: 黑色丝袜。去年在另一部戏剧中，她不得不穿短袜和鲜艳的橙色

lyrics.text: dress. If anyone ever asks her how old she is, she always answers,
lyrics.translation: 裙子。如果有人问她多大年纪，她总是回答，

lyrics.text: darling it must be terrible to be grown up.
lyrics.translation: 亲爱的，长大成人一定很可怕。
